alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 6:57PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CALHOUN COUNTY IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA THROUGH 645 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Blountstown. The strong thunderstorm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Altha, Red Oak, Ocheesee, Selman, Chason, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Kennys Mill, Willis, Nettle Ridge, Blountstown Airport, Macedonia, Torreya State Park, Durham, and White Pond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
